title: Join trips with zone names and validate KPIs
body: As a data analyst, I need a joined view of trips with pickup/dropoff zone names to compute borough-level KPIs.
acceptance_criteria: Passenger count must be between 1 and 6
Join coverage: PULocationID and DOLocationID must resolve to known zones; coverage must be >= 99.5%
Null tolerance: passenger_count null percentage must be <= 0.5%
notes: Use latest month parquet files in data/parquet; read-only access only. Provide borough names via zone lookup join on LocationID.
